result.translation: Woe to every backbiter and slanderer,
who amasses wealth and counts it over and again[1],
result.footnotes: [1] Instead of spending in the way of Allah.

result.translation: thinking that his wealth will make him live forever.
No indeed! He will surely be cast into the Crushing Fire[2],
result.footnotes: [2] i.e., Hellfire, as it crushes and destroys all that is thrown in it.

result.translation: and how do you know what the Crushing Fire is?
It is the kindled Fire of Allah,

result.footnotes: [3] Penetrating through bodies and reaching the hearts.

result.translation: It will be closed down upon them,

result.footnotes: [4] i.e., columns of fire or columns of iron to which the inmates of Hell are chained.
